channel.title: Spotify on tehblog
channel.description: Recent content in Spotify on tehblog

item.title: Music App
item.description: I really enjoy listening to music. There are several ways to get music. YT Music Honestly, I don’t know much about this service. I did do the free trial and it seemed ok. Prime Music I used this for a while as I have Prime and did like it, but a lot of music moved to their unlimited plan and I didn’t like that so I started to consider paying for a service.
